name: Laser Hair Removal
description: Safe and effective hair removal using cutting-edge laser technology using IPL Machine and Diode Laser.

name: IPL Skin Rejuvenation
description: Innovative technic to treat sun damage, redness, and even skin tone with help of IPL Machine.

name: Diode Skin Rejuvenation
description: An advanced, non-invasive treatment that helps restore a youthful, healthy appearance of the skin.

name: Sugaring
description: A natural hair removal method using sugar paste for smooth skin.

name: Waxing
description: Traditional waxing services for various body areas.

name: Manicure
description: Professional nail care and styling for hands.

name: Pedicure
description: Relaxing and detailed foot care including nail treatment.

name: Last Lift
description: A gentle and effective way to enhance your natural eyelashes without the need for extensions.

name: Brow Lift
description: A cosmetic procedure that raises and smooths the forehead to create a more youthful, refreshed appearance.
